Token.Abstract: Protocol to receive events related to file transfer.
Called upon receiving a file transfer request from a peer.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: peerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving a file transfer permission from a peer.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didReceivePermission:(BOOL)isPermitted filename:(null_unspecified NSString *)filename peerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)peerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: isPermitted
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the request was accepted.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: peerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called when the file being transferred is halted.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didDropTransfer:(null_unspecified NSString *)filename reason:(null_unspecified NSString *)message isExplicit:(BOOL)isExplicit peerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)peerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message specifying reason for the file transfer drop.

Parameter.Name: isExplicit
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to specify whether the transfer was halted explicity by the sender.

Parameter.Name: peerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon every file transfer progress update.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didUpdateProgress:(CGFloat)percentage isOutgoing:(BOOL)isOutgoing filename:(null_unspecified NSString *)filename peerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)peerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: percentage
Parameter.Abstract: The perccentage representing the progress of the transfer (CGFloat from 0 to 1).

Parameter.Name: isOutgoing
Parameter.Abstract: Boolean to specify if the transfer is a file beign sent (value would be YES) or received (value would be NO).

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in transmission.

Parameter.Name: peerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer thie file is sent to or received from.

Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didCompleteTransfer:(null_unspecified NSString *)filename fileData:(null_unspecified NSData *)fileData peerId:(null_unspecified NSString *)peerId

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the file in request.

Parameter.Name: fileData
Parameter.Abstract: NSData object holding the data transferred.

Parameter.Name: peerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.
